Events that occurred on 1 April.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1977 - J.R.R. Tolkien's children found The Tolkien Trust charity.
1984 - The Monsters and the Critics is published in the US.
2003 - J.R.R. Tolkien: His Life and Works is published.
2006 - The Roots of Tolkien's Middle Earth is published.
2009 - The Lord of the Rings Strategy Battle Game: War of the Ring is published.
2010 - The Legend of Sigurd and Gudr√∫n is released in paperback.
2010 - West of the Mountains, East of the Sea is published.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3019:
Frodo and Sam, rescued out of the fire, rest in Ithilien.
